attributes.action: Not add fluoride to our water supplies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of Alan Johnson's campaign to fluoridate our water supplies, I urge that this decision be shelved long before it reaches the public, where sadly a lot of misinformed and gullible people will vote this in. Fluoride is a harmful byproduct of industry and is the source of much (proven) health problems. It is disgraceful that a health secretary could even propose this!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
